channel.title: Npc drops wont work?
channel.description:
i used the youtube walkthroughs for npc drops and it didnt work. i copied this from my npcdrops.cfg [code]npcdrop = 2745 1 6570 1[/code] Jad - droptype is 1 - 6570 is firecape - 1 is amount. so then i pasted that code at the bottom of my npcdrops but i replaced the npc id to a mole. and the item is a white phat and coins instead of firecape
heres the one for my mole [code]npcdrop = 3340 1 1048 1 1048 1 992 456[/code]
i compiled and restared the server and the mole still isnt dropping anything.

item.title: Npc drops wont work?
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

Why not try this for a 317

[tt]npcdrop = 2745 6570 1 100[/tt]

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops wont work?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

i used the youtube walkthroughs for npc drops and it didnt work.
i copied this from my npcdrops.cfg

npcdrop = 2745		1		6570	1

Jad - droptype is 1 - 6570 is firecape - 1 is amount.
so then i pasted that code at the bottom of my npcdrops
but i replaced the npc id to a mole.
and the item is a white phat and coins instead of firecape

heres the one for my mole

npcdrop = 3340		1		1048	1	1048	1	992  456

i compiled and restared the server and the mole still isnt dropping anything.

Read full topic
